website_summaries.verdict: YOGABODY holds the brand name for the Yoga Trapeze, and it shows.
pros: Many users report considerable relief for much cheaper than traction or chiropractic care
The same equipment that’s available in YOGABODY studios
Helps with back decompression and realignment
Comes with an impressive 10 yr. parts guarantee
cons: Doesn't come with hooks or assembly instructions
DVD in some packages doesn’t work

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: It was great, for the four or five times it was used! Last week my 64 pound daughter was hanging upside down stretching her back for gymnastics class, and the cable snapped! Fortunately, I never let her use it without a tumbling mat. I only weigh 134 and it was rarely used because I suffered a back injury shortly after it was hung (unrelated to product) and was not allowed to use it. This was hung exactly as it was directed. I have not contacted Yogabody yet but will post as soon as I hear from them. I will try to upload the photos.
customer_reviews.author: anne21596

customer_reviews.title: 2x6 ceiling thingies
customer_reviews.text: Get it! I have two herniated disks, and on some days it's so bad that I can't walk. This has saved my back, it's cheaper, and more effective than an inversion table. I love it! I bought the ikea ceiling hook to use with this product. We also have 2x6 ceiling wood thingies. We used a 2x6x8' board & screwed it to the wood thingies through drywall.💃🏻 it's sturdy. Buzzed, but honest review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Swole & Flexy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the YogaBody Naturals Yoga Trapeze! I hang this from my Rogue Fitness Y-1 Yoke and it works perfectly. Great way to get traction on the spine and relieve back pain. Also great for working up to handstands and handstand push ups. Overall a great addition to our garage gym/workout arsenal. Use it for strength, meditation and stretching. Use it for getting great instagram photos. =P Get swole and flexy! Great quality for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Haley G.

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally purchased the swing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this in my wishlist for about a year and finally ordered it, I could not be happier! The color is beautiful! The company even sent me an email with detailed instructions for installation and set up!! It feels like quality material and was not as scary to install as I had thought! I am really glad I spent a little more to get this brand!!! It also works really well on the swing set at the playground too! It has really helped with my back and my core! Being upside down was very different than doing a headstand! But not in a bad way! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after three days...
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this a better review so badly. Ordered this a week or so ago but realized I couldn’t hang it from the beam I was hoping to, so had to wait for my hooks to arrive. Finally installed it three days ago and have been LOVING it...until one of the handles snapped while I was lifting myself into it this morning. Not cool. I want to keep trying it, so I guess now I’ll have to try to exchange it and hope the issue is with just the one I got, and not an overall statement of quality. Would hate to think something I’m hanging upsides down in could break while I was in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year-old daughter received this for her birthday and loves it! Both of my children play with it every day and my husband and i can also use it. I ended ip buying metal beam clamps rated for 1250 lbs (electrical section) and screw in eye hooks (hardware section) rated for 800 lbs at Home Depot for about $15 total. Lower rated clamps would have worked, but I picked my safest option. I also put a mattress under the swing, in case anyone falls. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Super Z's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun, pretty and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a purple one and the colors are true to the picture. It does not the hardware needed to secure it to beams but for $3 at Home Depot, I bought a porch swing hardware set and that was all I needed. I'll admit, I was a bit scared to put my weight on this (5'3, 185lbs) but it has held perfectly. I am still learning my moves but it has motivated me to get up every morning and spend some time focusing on stretching and strength training. *My kids also LOVE this. After the initial excitement (and goofing around) wore off, they actually spend time in this and are slowly mastering it!
customer_reviews.author: Gilliand3

customer_reviews.title: Great product BUT....
customer_reviews.text: I would NOT buy this if you are going to use it in a doorway. There is so many things that you can do when properly hung by the ceiling. To be fair, I haven't been able to fully experience all the moves and poses. I had a cervical neck fusion and the thought of hanging upside down and releasing that neck tension is what I wanted it for. I CANT wait to actually try it out fully. I just think that it's a bit pricey. On a positive note, It really is well made though and I like the 3 lengths of handles.
customer_reviews.author: Cavimom

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice sling, and I'd recommend it to anyone who ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sling, and I'd recommend it to anyone who is thinking about purchasing one. Years ago, I did have a sling that had a row of thicker padding that went across the lower back / upper pelvis area for hanging upside down. This sling isn't quite as comfortable for that particular purpose, but the body does adjust over time. Sometimes I just fold a towel and put it across the back of my upper pelvis if I feel I need a little more padding... thanks, YogaBody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Can Do This & So Can You
customer_reviews.text: My first time with this. Not to mention also my first time with yoga and I am extremely impressed with this! Wow! Great work out without any pain. I seem to have lost that pain in my back too! I like the tutorials they help me alot. I would highly recommend this. I'm 56 yrs old a bit out of shape but with yoga Trapeze I wont stay ths way. Excellent Sturdy and Easily to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Irish Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! Has help me expand my yoga knowledge and helped my back! Is great for my small home gym because it doesn't take up floor space. The kids love it too!
customer_reviews.author: MrsWilliams19

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The yoga trapeze is absolutely amazing! I mounted it in a doorway in my home because my ceilings aren't strong enough to hold the weight. The only drawback of mounting it in the doorway frame is the restriction on positions you can try. But other than that I'm very satisfied. I have sciatica and most mornings I would wake up with horrible pain in my hips and lower back. The yoga trapeze not only provides a great workout but it helps with my back pain tremendously! I would recommend this product to anyone and I love showing it off to my friends and family when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: Crm

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: DUUUUUUDE! I love this thing, perfect for stretching and flexibility gains. I get frequent knee pain because I tend to lean to one side of my leg, putting most of my weight on one specific knee, and back aches from hunching over my drawing board. This eliminates it all! It is also very supportive. I am 5'2, very bottom heavy with large/ thick legs and a full round butt. No discomfort! No pinching, no pain, no awkward moving or shimmying. Just awesome, relaxing release!
customer_reviews.author: Danica W

customer_reviews.title: and we love it! Its' a family favorite - kiddos use ...
customer_reviews.text: OK. We've had this trapeze for 2 weeks now, and we love it! Its' a family favorite - kiddos use it as a swing/mini hammock as well. It seems to be well made, and that it will take the abuse of time and many uses. It was easy to install, and it really is a lot of fun. We use it for stretching, and some gentle yoga as we slowly get better at the whole trapeze thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: Love my trapeze
customer_reviews.text: Love my trapeze! I've had it for a week and a half and I can't stay off of it lol my back feels great too. You don't have to be a yogi to use One either. You can do inverted crunches from it and other work outs. It's an awesome investment for under $100! Mine is in the doorway so I bought the doorway mount and it's solid. Used bigger screws than what came with it but it's good to go! It's too bad those stands are so expensive. I don't understand why. But come spring time it can be easily moved to a tree branch or something. Can't wait for that either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I could not be happier!!! I'm not someone who regularly exercise, and I have a high stress job. Coming home to hang upside down for a few minutes, really stretch out those muscles that get ignored, had made a huge difference for me. People are asking me what I'm doing to lose weight, that I look less tense, and somewhat relaxed. This trapeze has 100% changed my daily routine and I could not be happier! Highly recommend for the beginner, and the expert.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get the other brace you will need it if this is your first time with these
customer_reviews.text: Looks sturdy I they man with and a vet with a few spinal injuries dare not get in this thing lol but wife seems to love it and says it's a very good work out I would suggest that you make the braces and supports like a package thing as I think we will have to go back and purchase those to I didn't know what I was buying when I got it for mother's day but I can see as she gets better and we have 3 girls the rafters will need to be braced and supported
customer_reviews.author: mellokatattack

customer_reviews.title: My pain is going away!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from collapsed vertebrae in my lower back for a long time; since I have been hanging upside down on the Yogabody Trapeze I am no longer suffering. This is HUGE for me! I hope to explore other movements as I get used to this! So far I am super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Geina Bongirono

customer_reviews.title: I was very satisfied with the Yoga Trapeze
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the Yoga Trapeze! I love how it folds up for portability. I did order the door pole and found that not all door frames are 2 inches or more - but I was able to buy a piece of wood 2X2 and longer screws and solved the issue. I totally love having this item and wish i'd ordered it a long time ago!!!! :) It allows me to stretch and invert.... and, there are so many more poses i can learn to do - well beyond my initial purchase reasons. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: L Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Good swing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks and feels well made all the hardware is sturdy. Handles are a nice firm foam. Comes with a knotted rope for hanging. I recommend ordering a daisy chain to hang this. Even my kids are excited to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Full body workout!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It’s so versatile.. very physically challenging and also very relaxing. I hung it on my pull up bar, which isn’t ideal, but it’s all I got to work with in my house. So, if you want full range of this apparatus make sure you have the space for it- or take it to a park that has monkey bars or something. I also appreciate the beginner dvd that came with it. Except that it only talks you through specific poses.. it doesn’t teach you how to flow.
customer_reviews.author: HaJoCo

customer_reviews.title: I Love it! The yoga trapeze itself is very well ...
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! The yoga trapeze itself is very well made and I love the colors. However, It took me a while to install because I could not find an appropriate place to set it up at home and we ended up buying a A-Frame swing set... My only wish is that the trapeze stand was available for purchase as it is currently out of stock because although the swing set worked out, it isn't as tall or as stable as I would like. But otherwise, I am super excited and happy with the purchase. Thank you! :)
customer_reviews.author: Concepcion Patricio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it... I've had it for about 1 week and it's already been a game changer. I've suffered from lower back pain for many years... L5, S1, S2... The trapeze allows me to gently stretch my entire body. It also allows for the perfect amount of traction for my back. I love the handles on this particular model. I've tried a different kind of yoga hammock (silk) that didn't have these and I really like the additional things you can do with them in addition to the security and stability they provide. Thank you for creating such a great product! I hope it lasts for many moons to come.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The yoga trapeze arrived fast and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The yoga trapeze arrived fast and was easy to set up. I watched one of the online tutorials to make sure it was installed properly ( I hung it from the main beam in my basement) I can honestly say in just as little as 5 minutes a day, in a simple upside down inversion I feel the "stress of the day" begin to deminish. I practice hot yoga and will admit i am not very flexible, but my yoga swing is helping to work on that felixibility. If you are looking for something fun and new I would reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mann

customer_reviews.title: Monkey games for adults!
customer_reviews.text: The yoga trapeze is exactly as promised. I am having a blast with it! The hardest thing was getting it mounted in the room I wanted it, but now that it's up, I do something w/ the trapeze several times a day. A few stretches, an inversion, some push-ups (TRX style), etc, etc, etc. There are a ton of youtube videos out there with this product or other styles of yoga hammocks, so there is no shortage of ideas. I do struggle sometimes with how to make it more comfortable... work in progress.
customer_reviews.author: S. Curran

customer_reviews.title: The YogaBody trapeze was super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The YogaBody trapeze was super easy to install. I did it all by myself...well with the help of a ladder. :) I have tried some of the poses that are shown in the instructions that came with it. I hope to find more tutorials online so that I can benefit from all the trapeze can offer. The reason I only gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because the poses that are shown in the instructions are very limited.
customer_reviews.author: tiinygigi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga trapeze! I have back issues, weak shoulders and arms, the first 5 minutes on this thing and I could feel a burn in my lower stomach. After some time using it I was able to get into it without my stepstool! I was really excited about that!! :) I can feel it in my shoulders and the underside of my arms as well as my hips! everything feels good after I use it. I try to use it at least once a day, it helps keep me in line so I don't have to make too many trips to the chiropractor! I love it! great price, great deal and an amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth crace

customer_reviews.title: Enhancing my yoga routines.
customer_reviews.text: The item is of great quality, it is comfortable and secure. The installation instructions in the package were augmented by an email from the company with links to more detailed documents. We bolted it to the ceiling, the hardware installation (we used the Ikea Suspension Ceiling Hooks) took about 30 minutes. The installation of the product was easy, took about 10-15 minutes which included adjusting for height. Use of the product, as with any new exercise program/equipment will require the proper easing into - gradually working to where I can be as flexible and graceful as all the online videos and photos. I am looking forward to using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Strgte54

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to use!
customer_reviews.text: I am no slouch, and although not a yoga champion I have been taking yoga classes for years. This thing is a contraption! Lol. I cannot do any of the poses at all. The people in the videos make it looks super easy but trust me! It’s not! It is sitting in the corner because I can’t do anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great workout and great for spinal inversion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I love yoga and I have a spinal injury that I thought could benefit from some inversion therapy. I’ve learned so much about balance in the year I’ve owned this magnificent contraption. What’s more is that it has helped with my spinal pain and it’s a great place to relax while meditating. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to add something more to their yoga or just wanting to add a little at home inversion therapy to their pain relief regimen. However! You definitely need to watch the video before trying any new moves. There are a lot of fun videos on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian L. Ericson

customer_reviews.title: This yoga trapeze is amazing! At first I attached it to a pull ...
customer_reviews.text: This yoga trapeze is amazing! At first I attached it to a pull up bar in my doorway, a few days later it found a permenant home bolted into my ceiling using porch swing hooks I pick up at Walmart for $4.84 (for the set). You will get so many deliciously deep stretches from this. It has helped with developing a lot of upper body strength for me. It's exciting to use and makes me feel like a kid again. My regular (mat) yoga practice has deepened as a result of using this after just a few instances. I wish I had known about this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: I love my trapeze
customer_reviews.text: We originally got the trapeze because ariel yoga classes were about an hour away for a thirty minute class. The trapeze was very secure and easy to assemble. I have been using it for about month and a half now. It is easy to use, even for someone that is yoga challenged like myself. I love this product so much. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Yoga Sling Package
customer_reviews.text: Great product, the right price with all the necessary support from the company staff. This is a benchmark example of how all sellers on Amazon should perform. YogaBody will exceed your expectations, enough said
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: The trapeze was promptly delivered and neatly packaged. The were clear instructions and a link to more information. We are still " playing" with the trapeze and haven't realized its full potential. But it is strong ( I weight 220) and surprisingly comfortable to hang in. The handles are well placed and the actual band is wide. You feel very secure when using the trapeze. Fits all sizes a gains am 220 lbs, my wife is 120, we both are using it. Install was easy, I had an over head rack in place. So it is exactly as advertised. No surprises, you will get exactly what you ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I had to order the hooks to install this before I could use it as more than a hammock. Works awesome as a hammock but even better once actually installed! My kids enjoy playing on it (3, 5, 10 & 16), and I really feel the good burn of a workout after using it a short time. I am considering purchasing another one for another part of the house so more than one of us can be on it at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I was a ballet dancer for 20 years and this helps me stay limber and stretch. After multiple children, multiple cesareans it's hard to get a full core work out. This easily and wonderfully allows me to work out my whole body, especially my core while decompressing my back and watching my kids. Absolutely love it! Great product. Even my kids are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior Mom

customer_reviews.title: have one issue with handle
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the plastic handle cracking the very first time we used it. All the others are fine so I'm guessing this is a defect in the handle. Other than this, product seems to be of good quality. Trying to get in contact with Amazon or Yogabody now to replace handle. Giving 4 stars other than the cracked handle. Hopefully issue is resolved soon.
customer_reviews.author: cmo

customer_reviews.title: Fun and theraputic
customer_reviews.text: I have this set up in my home office and I love it. Got it for fun and to help with lower back pain. It's working! The doorway installation is kind of limiting, I would say best if you have an outdoor patio or something, but if you don't have that option (I don't) the doorway works just fine and I get in it whenever I want to take a break. At first, I would get kind of car sick and head achy but don't worry, that goes away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but need to register to access videos...why?
customer_reviews.text: You have to register the product to gain access to the instructional videos. This is poor business practice in my opinion. Free videos could help sell the product, not act as a gatekeeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this contraption. I'm not very good at it yet. I'm ok with that because I still want to do it and have taken it to the park etc. I'm always looking for a place to set it up. My job has me on the road a lot, this folds down small and is super simple to put up and take down. I can't say enough good things about it. You can get a full body work out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this! easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this! easy to use, easy to hang. I bought it for spinal decompression. I've since learned to use it for stretching, strength training and relaxation poses. Perfect for non compression inversions. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Is very difficult starting out, need to have upper and lower body strength starting out to manipulate. Is very good though if you can stick with it till you get to a level to really use
customer_reviews.author: Shalan

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, hanging from a pull-up apparatus in a doorway
customer_reviews.text: As a yoga novice I am finding that the yoga trapeze offers a unique variation to my budding yoga repertoire. It's sturdy, hanging from a pull-up apparatus in a doorway. The instructional video that accompanies the trapeze is short and sweet but thorough in instruction for how to get into the popular poses. I am invigorated to begin and build a workout regiment with my new yoga trapeze. I would recommend to anyone looking for a new and exciting way to stretch or work on core strengthening.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot harder then it looks but every day I get on there and I’m building strength. Everyone likes to swing on it when they came over. I did a flip yesterday and fell off. The sling prevented my head from hitting the floor! Excellent product. Easy to set up. Takes a lot of practice!!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: and found Lucas's instruction on how to install the trapeze very easy to follow and understand
customer_reviews.text: This was everything we expected. We researched the product first, and found Lucas's instruction on how to install the trapeze very easy to follow and understand. We manufacture and fabricate most things and my first thought was "I could make one of these". And it's true, I could. But by the time I would buy all the materials, it would cost the same, plus my time. This thing is sturdy and well made and I feel I paid a fair price. If you have a couple of hook set ups, you can move it around the house and outside. We have it in the middle of everything and our family loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long!
customer_reviews.text: Iam obsessed with my yoga trapeze! Great quality even looks pretty in my door way. I chose to hang it from a pull up bar, so far so good! I've started to watch videos on you tube to get a full class experience. I have a bad back and neck and this is helping with it a lot .
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: I sleep better at night when I use it to stretch before ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. I bought some eye-bolts and mounted it in my workout/quest room. I sleep better at night when I use it to stretch before bed. It is like a great workout but without the work, it is fun but my body feels the burn. Thank you YogaBody for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Monique A Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: The trapeze was extremely simple to set up and if you would need instructions they are very easy to find online. I have since used it multiple times and am in love with it. I will look to soon purchase the wall clamps for winter time. Definitely a 5/5 for this product. The only thing that was a bit harsh for me was the price. For something so simple and light it was definitely high in price. However I can see that it is a product to last a long time and overall well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it! I am a relatively fit 35 year old who has suffered with chronic lower back pain. I have tried so many different exercises and stretches that have never really helped. After using my new yoga trapeze just two times I have not felt any pain or strain since! Once you have secure hooks or however you are hanging, it is very easy to hang and start using right away. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Barrila

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking at prices for a teeter hangup and that costs roughly$200. This alternative is far more reasonably priced and about the same as a massage. It's really helped me to ease the pain in my back and the yoga video as well as suggested poses is a great guide. It's comfortable and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I could totally tell a difference with my back pain in a few days using it for just even a few times a day for even 30 sec to get used to the feeling. I AM TOTALLY IN LOVE WITH THIS...
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install in the basement but I’m enjoying it ...
customer_reviews.text: I know NOTHING about yoga but have lower back related to a car accident 9 months ago. The inversion alone by hanging upside down helps so much. I invert three times a day and it really stretches my torso. It was easy to install in the basement but I’m enjoying it so much I bought the door hanger. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie728

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice.
customer_reviews.text: My bf got this for my birthday. It was the best gift ever. I cant stay of it. Its very easy to set up and they include a video just in case. The material is very sturdy and durable. It helps me with back pains and my core. Omg my core has been firming up so well because I've been using this. I just turn some yoga trapeze videos on YouTube and follow along with my yoga body trapeze.
customer_reviews.author: Quirk_Unlimited

customer_reviews.title: I sleep so much better after and I feel like my muscles/joints are looser ...
customer_reviews.text: i am totally addicted to this after 4 days! I sleep so much better after and I feel like my muscles/joints are looser and I'm not so tensed up. Kind of uncomfortable at first but you get used to after about the 3rd workout. You really just have to ease into it and trust the swing to hold you. Easy to install-just mounted it in basement, looping through floor truss.
customer_reviews.author: BabyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Love my trapaze
customer_reviews.text: Love my trapaze. Used JGS heavy duty 1800 lbs to hang from ceiling in house (make sure you attach to stud beam). Very quiet. Trapaze is very well made, love the purple colors. Trapaze is sturdy, holds weight great, and you can do a ton of yoga exercise positions. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of trick to install in the house. But I absolutely love the yoga trapeze. It's amazing! I am on my feet all day and my back hurts at times so much that I can't even sleep. But just stretching on the trapeze for a couple minutes makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install ( the YouTube video they have is excellent). I was worried about where I would use this during the colder months, because using it outside during winter didnt seem to fun. Luckily I also purchased a pair of hammock hooks and hooked them into my ceiling beams in my bedroom. I really dont need that much space to get a good workout or some fun playtime in. The trapeze is sturdy, has a nice feel to the mterial and the handles have a nice strong grip. I highly recommend the YogaBody Yoga Trapeze for anyone looking to begin inversions, strecth more, or literally hang out :) .
customer_reviews.author: Emelia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and awesome new way to stretch
customer_reviews.text: I love it! However I recommend it more with a ceiling mount than a door mount so you can perform more positions and won't be restricted by the door way.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Butler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of time into whether or not to invest in this, and I am so glad I got it. I wasn’t sure about using it in a doorway, but it’s amazing. It helps relieve my spine and overall energy flow in my body. I can already tell a difference in my flexibility. I just wish the stand was cheaper so I could get one and use it without the doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought this for inversion therapy; so much easier for me than using inversion boots. Very easy to mount; their online instructions are very clear. They really should put something in the package telling you to check online; if it weren't for the reviews here, I would have had no idea. That quibble aside, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very easy to install. I hung it with the included straps over the beam in the basement. There are tons of you tube videos to show you how use the yoga trapeze. I ordered it to relieve lower back and it does seem to help in the week that I have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Help relieve pressure and pain on the spine 😁
customer_reviews.text: This has been a blessing for me, I suffer from osteoarthritis and bone spurs in my spine and since using the yoga trapeze I have had huge relieve in pressure and pain in my back. For the first time in years I am able to start moving a bit easier. This yoga trapeze also helped my husband a great deal. He has a physical job and it puts a lot of strain on his back he also suffers from back pain and his now pain free. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wow just wow
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing product. So glad I made the buy. It's for my wife. We are both yogis but I don't use the swing yet. She's more advanced than me. But the quality and instructions that came in the email and the follow ups from the company is great. Would recommend to any yogi out there.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: No chart
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it is working beautifully for my intentions. The only thing is that mine did not arrive with a pose chart as suggested in the ad. Ibwas not successful finding the chart online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So many uses!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tool for stretching when you are a broken disabled person. It also helps with intimate playfulness. ;)
customer_reviews.author: christina b.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Yoga Trapeze
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga trapeze! Its very well worth the money and is excellent quality. Its simple to install and comes with a DVD for learning how to use it. I've used it daily since receiving it and I love it. I even use it just to sit and gently swing while watching TV, its super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Sciatic issues? No more!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!!!!! Got this quickly and set it up. Was nervous about it holding me but I checked every stitch which are all well made. I sat in it, swung upside down and my back!!! It cracked all the way up. I have gone 2 days without going upside-down and I can tell a huge difference!! I hurt again. I have a ton of sciatic issues and this helps sooooo much!
customer_reviews.author: Bex Jo

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This swing has helped my back so much already! I am excited to get out of bed these days!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E Sabotka

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing evvvver!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase of 2016 for me. Absolutely obsessed! I have bought two for my friends and They are now obsessed with it. Any level of yogi can use this, I've become so inspired to move forward with my yoga practice and to get stress relief I wasn't able to from mat work. I highly highly higly recommend this trapeze. Also the company of yoga body have included some awesome extras and they have awesome trapeze classes in their website. Thank you so much.?
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Y.

customer_reviews.title: Saving me so much!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my yoga trapeze. I have it in the main part of my home and my friends always ask what it is. When I set it up for them, they always want to know where I got it and how do they get one. I am saving so much on the therapy my chiro wanted me to have with owning one of these and I couldn't be happier!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect new workout and stretch set I have been looking ...
customer_reviews.text: YES! YES! YES! I loooooove this swing! It is the perfect new workout and stretch set I have been looking for. It keeps me entertained and not bored which allows me to get in a good workout and builds motivation to use it.
customer_reviews.author: AshJ

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!  Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited almost a year to review this, frankly because I was concerned that it wouldn't hold up. It has held up beautifully! I use it frequently and the workouts are the best-- especially to do inversions. It is built well and is comfortable. I started unable to do very much due to my physical challenges. Now I can do a great deal more and part of it is the trapeze itself. I am particularly grateful for the ability to do inversions which help my neck and back issues. This is an excellent tool to use for many reasons-- including as a hammock to rest in under the trees! :-)
customer_reviews.author: RSLyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! very high quality material
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! very high quality material. comes with an instructional Dvd. need to purchase mounts separately. Does come with rope and carabineers to attach to mounts, or can be used without mounts and placed around a horizontal pole or beam or tree branch. plenty of rope for a large diameter branch.
customer_reviews.author: TheBoss

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old gymnist cant get enough of this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I have to play with it a bit more to get used to the moves. Not bad though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rizwana

customer_reviews.title: DVD does not play
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this 5 stars, but the DVD does not work which is very disappointing. I'm not sure who I contact to fix this either without having to return the entire item. I was going to order the other videos they offer, but afraid they won'twork either.
customer_reviews.author: tomatobean

customer_reviews.title: Helps alleviate my nerve pain!
customer_reviews.text: Love my yoga trapeze. High quality and so easy to set up. I purchased this trapeze to help to decompress my back as I have quite a bit of nerve pain in my legs and feet. I have arthritis in my spine, spinal stenosis and a couple bulging discs. Have used it for a week and already having less nerve and back pain. I hang on my trapeze in the morning and evening. I would recommend this to help with back and nerve pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Zen Baby
customer_reviews.text: Attached to Omni trapeze, with Rotational Device/Swivel.....this type of feeling shouldn’t be legal .... Looked weird to me at first, but figured it out quick when i woke up next day and my abs at 45 yo, were on fire!!
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I like the trapeze but I wish it would have come ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the trapeze but I wish it would have come with ceiling hanging equipment or better instructions on how to install. Searching on the web has helped.
customer_reviews.author: BChase

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: fabulous, easy to install, and has helped my decompression for my bulging disc already after using it for over a week! I'm excited to get into this a little more and add it to my weightlifting and yoga regimine
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This swing is amazing! I am able to work on my flexibility as well as do many strength exercises. I had been to a few classes and decided that I wanted to buy one. After researching all different swings, I went with this one and couldn't be happier. It came fast and is very well made. Between going to a class or two and searching on YouTube there are endless opportunities.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity
customer_reviews.text: I got my 2 granddaughters these for Christmas. They are 12 and 14 years old They both ask for them and both really enjoy them. Their dad installed the 2 Trapeze with the brackets I purchased with the gift. They are getting a lot of fun out of them. The product is durable as I write and seems to be something they will enjoy for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Herr

customer_reviews.title: Lovely prop to add to your yoga equipment.
customer_reviews.text: So I've just started using it. I have never used one before or even seen a real class with one. I had only seen a demonstration. This will definitely take your yoga workout to the next level. But the comfort from wrapping yourself in it is also amazing. So looking forward to working it into my regular yoga routine. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dolphinjen14

customer_reviews.title: Watch the training dvd
customer_reviews.text: It is everything good you read about. Love it! Only giving it a 4star since 5 of the 6 handles broke in less then 10min of it being set up. Must have just been a bad batch. Working with yogabody to get the handles fix or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Rozemaryzzr

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners to advanced. so much to learn, do and stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: I haven't installed this yet, but I just received ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't installed this yet, but I just received it and the fabric is nicer than I remember. I tried the same brand at my friend's house last year, and he loves his trapeze. I got it in purple, but I wish I'd chosen orange. I'll update this review with photos
customer_reviews.author: stacey ca

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! You can use this to deepen your yoga practice, strengthening tool as well as a therapeutic tool. I can reach places on my low back that I otherwise cannot. Bonus, my girls are using it as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Catlaur

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my room and use it daily. My daughter uses it as a hammock to watch tv in as well as her own flips. We have put it through a lot and it’s like new still.
customer_reviews.author: katsum

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this trapeze. I have a bad back and it helps me stretch it out. Assembly is really easy for me to put together and take down.
customer_reviews.author: XVbaby

customer_reviews.title: no ceiling anchors
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good quality but I can't use it yet because it didn't come with ceiling anchors or instructions on how to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hambly

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home practice
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my home practice;the yoga trapeze hangs in the doorway so it doesn't take much space. Material is almost like parachute material, everything seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Love this Swing!
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Got to me very quickly. The purple color is beautiful! Set up was super easy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cami  Stewart-Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trapeze, good quality, easy to assemble. Would recommend to anyone looking for relief of back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I hoped for and more! The yoga trapeze has changed my spine and back. I have mild scholiosis, and never realized I've been living with a dull pain in my lower back till it was gone the morning after I started using this product. I highly recommend this to anyone experiencing back pain. Mahalo nui!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a blast! Look at every surface differently (hmmmm ...
customer_reviews.text: What a blast! Look at every surface differently (hmmmm, could I hang from this bannister/doorway/fire escape??) Enjoying it with my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Bosson

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I use it to decompress my spine ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it to decompress my spine and to work on flexibility. I can do a back bend on this whereas I'm unable to on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift and she loves it took a lil work to get hanging but it's fun. Cost a bit for what you actually get but hey money grows on trees for us right. Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Pillis

customer_reviews.title: Yoga master
customer_reviews.text: It is going to take some time until I am able to do many of the poses this item will support! That said, I feel comfortable in it (safe) and the material seems strong. It is slick enough to provide ease of movement.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: I love my trapeze
customer_reviews.text: In just a few days my back pain has subsided. Hanging upside down for a min or so a few times a day is where I have began. I'm excited to go further with it. Easy to assemble. Affordable and made with great materials. Thank you. I will b pleased to share a updated review as I play around more with it
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: best you can get
customer_reviews.text: love it. great high quality. after the first time you do it easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Product was as expected. Good quality. Fairly easy to install. The only issue I had was the screws that came with it. I used a power drill and even on a low setting going slow and cautious, the heads stripped very easy. I had to pre-drill a decent hole to get them all the way into the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: Thrace

product_meta.title: YOGABODY Yoga Trapeze Pro – Yoga Inversion Swing with Free Video Series and Pose Chart, Purple
feature_bullets: Relieve Back Pain. Get instant traction and create more space between your vertebrae when you hang upside down.
Increase Strength, Balance, Flexibility. Posterior chain, grip, backbends, hamstrings, and hip openers.
Bonus Video Tutorials and Pose Chart. Online access to professional tutorials and pose charts for beginners.
Easy Setup. Hang in minutes from a chin-up bar, beam, or solid tree branch. Ceiling hooks and stand sold separately.
Safety-Tested to 600lbs. Rubber handle grips, adjustable straps, gym-grade carabiners, stylish carrying bag.
